actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 10 (2d6+3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The worg's Perception is 19 while perceiving by hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Monstrosity Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The worg is resistant to exhaustion and to the frightened condition.
